item.title: Unbundle the axes
item.description: I found it for emotional/rational. Sun found it for capitalism / communism. Example: Unbundle the axes.

item.title: "Half Art Half Science" is not the maximum it can be
item.description: When people say something is “half art” / “half science”, to me that is a kind of scissor statement. It shows they have the wrong metaphor for understanding what these two things are & how they relate.
